name: Bubble Age: A Shoot and Pop Puzzle Game
name_original: Bubble Age: A Shoot and Pop Puzzle Game
description:
Take the ultimate journey through a lost world of Dinos and danger. Pop and drop all the obstacles in your path with your trusty bubble sling and your Dino helpers. Bubble Age is the epic adventure of a family searching for their lost son in an inhospitable prehistoric world.

Bubble Age has captivated millions of players on Facebook and is now available on your mobile device!

Features:
* Amazing graphics that will leave you breathless
* Easy to learn and play, but a challenge to master
* Hundreds of levels with many different obstacles
* Adventure across a stunning prehistoric world
* Leaderboards - Score big to beat your friends’ scores
* Unlock boosters and helpers
* Turn bombs, spiders nests, ice bubbles, hatchers, doom bubbles, locks and lots more
* Permanent stone charms to help you get through the challenging levels
* Exciting animations and beautiful music
* FREE updates with new levels, powers and obstacles

Facebook Game: http://apps.facebook.com/BubbleAge
Fan Page: http://www.facebook.com/BubbleAge

Please note: Your device must have an active internet connection (cellular or Wi-Fi) to be able to play.

SUPPORT:
We are constantly working on improving the game and your feedback is important. You may reach us via the in-game support button.
